member.name: T:Syncfusion.Themes.MaterialLightBlue.WPF.MaterialLightBlueThemeSettings
member.summary: Represents a class that holds the respective theme color and common key values for customization

member.summary: Gets or sets the font size of header related areas of control in selected theme

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Themes.MaterialLightBlue.WPF.MaterialLightBlueThemeSettings.BodyFontSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the font size of content area of control in selected theme

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Themes.MaterialLightBlue.WPF.MaterialLightBlueThemeSettings.BodyAltFontSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the alternate font size of content area of control in selected theme

example.code: MaterialLightBlueThemeSettings materialLightBlueThemeSettings = new MaterialLightBlueThemeSettings(); materialLightBlueThemeSettings.Body AltFontSize = 10;

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Themes.MaterialLightBlue.WPF.MaterialLightBlueThemeSettings.FontFamily
member.summary: Gets or sets the font family of text in control for selected theme

example.code: MaterialLightBlueThemeSettings materialLightBlueThemeSettings = new MaterialLightBlueThemeSettings(); materialLightBlueThemeSettings.FontFamily = new FontFamily("Callibri");
